title: On the functoriality of Khovanov homology
summary: We provide an overview of Blanchet's oriented model of Khovanov homology, which resolves the sign ambiguity in functoriality. We give a detailed and self-contained exposition of the construction. We establish strict functoriality for the oriented model and briefly outline its extension to cobordisms with singularities recently studied by Scott Carter, Benjamin Cooper, Mikhail Khovanov and Vyacheslav Krushkal.

AI.tldr: 本文详细介绍了Blanchet的定向Khovanov同调模型，解决了函子性中的符号模糊问题，并建立了严格函子性，还简要扩展到带奇点的配边
AI.motivation: Khovanov同调在函子性方面存在符号模糊问题，需要建立严格的定向模型来解决这一理论缺陷，为拓扑量子场论提供更严谨的数学基础
AI.method: 采用Blanchet的定向模型构建方法，详细阐述了构造过程，建立了严格的函子性，并扩展到Carter、Cooper、Khovanov和Krushkal最近研究的带奇点配边
AI.result: 成功构建了定向Khovanov同调模型，解决了符号模糊问题，建立了严格函子性，为拓扑量子场论提供了更完善的数学框架
AI.conclusion: Blanchet的定向模型为Khovanov同调提供了严格的函子性基础，解决了长期存在的符号问题，并且可以扩展到更一般的带奇点配边情形，推动了拓扑量子场论的发展

title: Drinfeld Isomorphism for Novel Quantum Affine Algebra of Type $A_{1}^{(1)}$
summary: In this paper, we first review the definition of the novel quantum affine algebra \(U_{\textbf{q}}(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)\) of type \(A_{1}^{(1)}\) given in \cite{FHZ, HZhuang}. Furthermore, by introducing \(Ω\)-invariant generating functions, we construct the Drinfeld realization \(U^{D}_{\textbf{q}}(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)\) of this algebra, and prove that \(U_{\textbf{q}}(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)\) and \(U^{D}_{\textbf{q}}(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)\) are algebraically isomorphic, which is known as the Drinfeld Isomorphism.

AI.tldr: 该论文回顾了新型量子仿射代数U_q(̂sl_2)的定义，通过引入Ω-不变生成函数构造了其Drinfeld实现U^D_q(̂sl_2)，并证明了两个代数同构的Drinfeld同构定理。
AI.motivation: 研究量子仿射代数U_q(̂sl_2)的Drinfeld实现，建立其与标准定义之间的代数同构关系，深化对量子代数结构的理解。
AI.method: 首先回顾已有定义，然后引入Ω-不变生成函数构造Drinfeld实现U^D_q(̂sl_2)，最后证明两个代数之间的代数同构。
AI.result: 成功构造了Drinfeld实现U^D_q(̂sl_2)，并严格证明了U_q(̂sl_2)与U^D_q(̂sl_2)之间的代数同构，即Drinfeld同构定理。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了量子仿射代数U_q(̂sl_2)的两种等价实现，验证了Drinfeld同构定理，为量子代数的进一步研究提供了理论基础。

title: Gorenstein homological invariants and monoidal model categories of Hopf algebras
summary: Let $H$ be a Hopf algebra over a field $k$ with a bijective antipode. It is proved that the Gorenstein global dimension of $H$ coincides with the Gorenstein projective dimension of the trivial left (or right) $H$-module $k$. Then, $H$ is finite dimensional if and only if the Gorenstein projective dimension of $k$ is trivial. Although monoidal Morita-Takeuchi equivalence of Hopf algebras does not preserve the global dimension, we demonstrate that it does preserve the Gorenstein global dimension and the Artin-Schelter Gorenstein property; this supports Brown-Goodearl's question of whether every noetherian (affine) Hopf algebra is AS Gorenstein. Finally, for $H$ and an $H$-Galois object $B$, we show the categories of modules $_H\mathcal{M}$ and $_B\mathcal{M}_B^H$ are monoidal model categories regarding Gorenstein projective model structure, provided that the Gorenstein global dimension of $H$ is finite. The corresponding stable categories are tensor triangulated categories.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Hopf代数的Gorenstein整体维数，证明了其与平凡模k的Gorenstein投射维数相等，并探讨了有限维性、Morita-Takeuchi等价保持性以及Gorenstein投射模型结构。
AI.motivation: 研究Hopf代数的同调维数，特别是Gorenstein整体维数与平凡模的Gorenstein投射维数之间的关系，探索Hopf代数的有限维性判据，以及在不同等价关系下Gorenstein性质的保持性。
AI.method: 使用Hopf代数理论、同调代数方法和Gorenstein维数理论，通过分析Hopf代数H的Gorenstein整体维数与平凡左（或右）H-模k的Gorenstein投射维数的关系，研究有限维性条件，并探讨monoidal Morita-Takeuchi等价对Gorenstein性质的保持。
AI.result: 1. Hopf代数H的Gorenstein整体维数等于平凡模k的Gorenstein投射维数；2. H是有限维的当且仅当k的Gorenstein投射维数为0；3. Monoidal Morita-Takeuchi等价保持Gorenstein整体维数和Artin-Schelter Gorenstein性质；4. 当H的Gorenstein整体维数有限时，可以建立Gorenstein投射模型结构。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了Hopf代数Gorenstein维数的重要性质，为有限维性提供了新的同调判据，证明了Gorenstein性质在monoidal Morita-Takeuchi等价下的稳定性，并构建了相关的模型范畴和三角张量范畴结构，支持了Brown-Goodearl关于Noetherian Hopf代数AS Gorenstein性质的猜想。

title: Monoidal categorification from alternating snakes
summary: In a recent paper, the authors introduced the notion of an alternating snake and a corresponding family of finite dimensional modules for the quantum affine algebra associated to $A_n$. We prove that under some restrictions, an alternating snake defines a canonical monoidal category. We prove that this category has finitely many prime objects. As a consequence we prove that the Grothendieck ring is isomorphic to the Grothendieck ring of the category $\mathscr C_ξ$ for a suitable height function. In particular it follows that the special family of alternating snakes provides a monoidal categorification of a cluster algebra of type $A_N$ for a suitable value of $N$.

AI.tldr: 交替蛇概念用于构造量子仿射代数A_n的有限维模范畴，证明该范畴具有有限个素对象，其Grothendieck环与特定高度函数的范畴同构，从而为A_N型丛代数提供单子范畴化。
AI.motivation: 研究量子仿射代数A_n的交替蛇概念及其对应的有限维模范畴，探索这些范畴的结构性质及其与丛代数的联系，旨在为特定类型的丛代数提供范畴化框架。
AI.method: 引入交替蛇概念，构造相应的有限维模范畴；在限制条件下证明该范畴构成单子范畴；分析范畴的素对象数量；建立Grothendieck环与特定高度函数范畴的同构关系。
AI.result: 交替蛇定义了一个单子范畴，该范畴具有有限个素对象；其Grothendieck环与范畴C_ξ的Grothendieck环同构；特殊的交替蛇族为A_N型丛代数提供了单子范畴化。
AI.conclusion: 交替蛇概念成功构造了量子仿射代数A_n的有限维模单子范畴，该范畴具有有限素对象结构，其Grothendieck环与特定范畴同构，从而实现了A_N型丛代数的范畴化，为量子群表示论与丛代数的联系提供了新视角。

title: F-symbols and R-symbols for the Drinfeld center of the Haagerup subfactor
summary: We have recently devised and implemented an algorithm for computing the Drinfeld center of a fusion category in our software package \textsc{TensorCategories.jl}. By simplifying the field of definition of the F-symbols, R-symbols, and pivotal coefficients of the Haagerup H3 category, we were now able to compute explicit F-symbols, R-symbols, and pivotal coefficients for its Drinfeld center Z(H3). In this paper, we discuss how to access this data. We also present our new general algorithm for finding a gauge of a multiplicity-free fusion category in which the symbols belong to a minimal field.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了计算Haagerup H3范畴Drinfeld中心的显式F符号、R符号和枢轴系数的方法，并提出了寻找多重性自由融合范畴最小域规范的新算法。
AI.motivation: 融合范畴的Drinfeld中心计算在数学物理中具有重要意义，但通常计算复杂。Haagerup H3范畴作为重要的非群范畴例子，其Drinfeld中心的显式计算一直具有挑战性。
AI.method: 通过简化H3范畴F符号、R符号和枢轴系数的定义域，使用TensorCategories.jl软件包中的算法计算Z(H3)的显式符号数据，并提出寻找最小域规范的新算法。
AI.result: 成功计算了Haagerup H3范畴Drinfeld中心的显式F符号、R符号和枢轴系数，并开发了寻找多重性自由融合范畴最小域规范的有效算法。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了访问Haagerup H3范畴Drinfeld中心数据的方法，并提出了寻找最小域规范的新算法，为融合范畴计算提供了重要工具。

title: Spectral Codes: A Geometric Formalism for Quantum Error Correction
summary: We present a new geometric perspective on quantum error correction based on spectral triples in noncommutative geometry. In this approach, quantum error correcting codes are reformulated as low energy spectral projections of Dirac type operators that separate global logical degrees of freedom from local, correctable errors. Locality, code distance, and the Knill Laflamme condition acquire a unified spectral and geometric interpretation in terms of the induced metric and spectrum of the Dirac operator. Within this framework, a wide range of known error correcting codes including classical linear codes, stabilizer codes, GKP type codes, and topological codes are recovered from a single construction. This demonstrates that classical and quantum codes can be organized within a common geometric language. A central advantage of the spectral triple perspective is that the performance of error correction can be directly related to spectral properties. We show that leakage out of the code space is controlled by the spectral gap of the Dirac operator, and that code preserving internal perturbations can systematically increase this gap without altering the encoded logical subspace. This yields a geometric mechanism for enhancing error correction thresholds, which we illustrate explicitly for a stabilizer code. We further interpret Berezin Toeplitz quantization as a mixed spectral code and briefly discuss implications for holographic quantum error correction. Overall, our results suggest that quantum error correction can be viewed as a universal low energy phenomenon governed by spectral geometry.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于非交换几何中谱三元组的新几何视角来理解量子纠错码，将量子纠错码重新表述为狄拉克型算子的低能谱投影，为经典和量子纠错码提供了统一的几何语言。
AI.motivation: 论文的动机是建立量子纠错码与几何结构之间的深层联系，为不同类型的纠错码提供统一的数学框架，从而更好地理解纠错码的性能和优化机制。
AI.method: 采用非交换几何中的谱三元组方法，将量子纠错码重新表述为狄拉克型算子的低能谱投影，通过谱性质分析纠错码的局部性、码距和Knill-Laflamme条件等特征。
AI.result: 成功将经典线性码、稳定子码、GKP型码和拓扑码等广泛纠错码纳入统一构造，证明码空间泄漏受狄拉克算子谱隙控制，并展示了通过内部扰动增强纠错阈值的几何机制。
AI.conclusion: 量子纠错可以被视为由谱几何支配的普遍低能现象，谱三元组视角为理解量子纠错提供了统一的几何语言，并揭示了增强纠错性能的新机制。

title: Paravortices: loop braid representations with both generators involutive
comment: second version: removed appendices, some new results added
summary:
We first motivate the study of a certain quotient of the loop braid category, both for the mathematics underpinning recent approaches to topological quantum computation; and as a key example in non-semisimple higher representation theory. For reasons that will become clear, we call this quotient the mixed doubles category, $MD$. Then our main result is a theorem classifying all mixed doubles representations in rank-2.
  Each representation yields a mixed doubles group representation for every loop braid group $LB_n$, and we are able to analyse the unified linear representation theory of many of these sequences of representations, using a mixture of very classical, classical, and new techniques. In particular this is a motivating example for the `glue' generalisation of charge-conserving representation theory (a form of rigid higher non-semisimplicity) introduced recently.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究环辫范畴的特定商（混合双范畴MD），分类了秩2的所有混合双表示，这些表示为每个环辫群LB_n提供了混合双群表示，并分析了这些表示序列的线性表示理论。
AI.motivation: 研究环辫范畴的特定商有两个动机：一是为拓扑量子计算的最新方法提供数学基础；二是作为非半单高阶表示理论的关键例子。
AI.method: 引入混合双范畴MD作为环辫范畴的商，使用经典、半经典和新技术相结合的方法，分析这些表示序列的线性表示理论，特别是应用了最近引入的"胶合"推广的电荷守恒表示理论。
AI.result: 主要结果是分类了秩2的所有混合双表示，每个表示都为每个环辫群LB_n提供了混合双群表示，并能够分析这些表示序列的统一线性表示理论。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为拓扑量子计算提供了数学基础，同时作为非半单高阶表示理论的重要例子，展示了"胶合"推广的电荷守恒表示理论的应用价值。

title: A triangular decomposition for the crystal lattice of quantized function algebras
comment: v1: 21 pages. Comments welcome; v2: 26 pages, substantially rewritten, two sections and some references added; v3: 27 pages, Proof of the triangular decomposition rewritten due to an error in the earlier version, some other small reorganization of the content;
summary: We prove a triangular decomposition theorem for the lower crystal lattice $\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)$ of the quantized function algebra $\mathcal{O}_{t}(G)$, where $G$ is a connected simply connected complex Lie group with Lie algebra $\mathfrak {g}$ of type $A_{n}$, $B_{n}$, $C_{n}$, $D_{n}$, $E_{6}$ or $E_{7}$. As a consequence, we prove the inclusion $\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)\subseteq\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(K)$ conjectured by Matassa \& Yuncken in these cases. We also give a precise definition of the specialization map used by Matassa \& Yuncken, which helps simplify their description of the crystallized algebra. This allows us to prove that the crystallized algebra $C(K_{0})$ is a compact quantum semigroup for the above mentioned cases, thus extending an earlier result for type $A_{n}$ compact quantum groups. As another consequence of the triangular decomposition, we prove that the notions of crystallized quantized function algebra given by Matassa \& Yuncken coincide with that of Giri \& Pal in the type $A_{n}$ case.

AI.tldr: 证明了量子函数代数下晶格的三三角分解定理，并由此证明了Matassa & Yuncken猜想，同时给出了结晶代数的精确定义，证明了其紧量子半群性质。
AI.motivation: 研究量子函数代数下晶格的结构，特别是验证Matassa & Yuncken提出的包含关系猜想，并为结晶代数提供更精确的定义和结构分析。
AI.method: 证明了量子函数代数下晶格$\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)$的三三角分解定理，利用这一分解定义了Matassa & Yuncken使用的特殊化映射，简化了结晶代数的描述。
AI.result: 1. 证明了$\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)\subseteq\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(K)$的包含关系猜想；2. 给出了特殊化映射的精确定义；3. 证明了结晶代数$C(K_{0})$是紧量子半群；4. 证明了在$A_{n}$型情况下，Matassa & Yuncken与Giri & Pal定义的结晶量子函数代数概念一致。
AI.conclusion: 通过三三角分解定理，成功解决了量子函数代数下晶格的结构问题，验证了相关猜想，并为结晶代数的研究提供了更坚实的基础，将紧量子群的结果推广到了更广泛的李代数类型。

title: Skein Categories in Non-semisimple Settings
comment: v2: Many small changes following referees suggestions. To appear in Selecta Mathematica. Comments welcome!
summary:
We introduce a version of skein categories of surfaces which depends on a tensor ideal in a linear ribbon category, thereby extending the existing theory to the setting of non-semisimple TQFTs. We obtain modified notions of skein algebras of surfaces and skein modules of 3-cobordisms for non-semisimple ribbon categories.
  We prove that these skein categories built from ideals coincide with factorization homology, shedding new light on the similarities and differences between the semisimple and non-semisimple settings. The essential difference is the need to work with profunctors in the non-semisimple setting. Doing so produces a ``distinguished presheaf'' which plays the role of the distinguished object in skein categories in semisimple settings. As a consequence, we get a skein-theoretic description of factorization homology for a large class of balanced braided presentable categories, precisely all those which are expected to induce oriented categorified 3-TQFTs.

AI.tldr: 该论文将辫子范畴的skein范畴理论扩展到非半单情形，通过引入张量理想构建了适用于非半单TQFT的skein范畴、代数和模，并证明其与分解同调等价。
AI.motivation: 现有skein范畴理论主要针对半单辫子范畴，需要将其扩展到非半单情形，以构建更广泛的拓扑量子场论（TQFT）框架。
AI.method: 在线性辫子范畴中引入张量理想，构建基于理想的skein范畴；在非半单设置中使用profunctor，产生"特殊预层"替代半单设置中的特殊对象。
AI.result: 证明了基于理想的skein范畴与分解同调等价，为一大类平衡辫子可呈现范畴提供了skein理论描述，这些范畴预期可诱导定向范畴化3-TQFT。
AI.conclusion: 该工作将skein范畴理论成功扩展到非半单TQFT，揭示了半单与非半单设置间的异同，为构建更广泛的范畴化3-TQFT提供了新工具。

title: The modular properties of $\mathfrak{sl}(2)$ torus $1$-point functions
comment: 31 pages, 2 tables; version to appear in Trans. AMS
summary:
Conformal field theory and its axiomatisation in terms of vertex operator algebras or chiral algebras are most commonly considered on the Riemann sphere. However, an important constraint in physics and an interesting source of mathematics is the fact that conformal field theories are expected to be well defined on any Riemann surface. To this end, a thorough understanding of chiral torus 1-point functions, ideally including explicit formulae, is a prerequisite for a detailed understanding of higher genera. These are distinguished from characters or vacuum torus 1-point functions because the insertion point is explicitly allowed to be labelled by any module over the vertex operator algebra rather than just the vertex operator algebra itself.
  Compellingly, chiral torus 1-point functions exhibit interesting modular properties, which we explore here in the example of the simple affine $\mathfrak{sl}(2)$ vertex operator algebras at non-negative integral levels. We determine the dimension of the space spanned by such functions, choose a natural basis to construct vector-valued modular forms and describe the congruence properties of these forms. In particular, we find explicit generators for the spaces of all vector-valued modular forms of dimension at most three, when the insertion comes from a simple module other than the vertex operator algebra. Finally, we use the fact that categories of modules over rational vertex operator algebras are modular tensor categories to give explicit formulae for the action of the modular group on chiral torus 1-point functions entirely in terms of categorical data. The usual modular $\mathsf{S}$ and $\mathsf{T}$ matrices of characters are known not to be complete invariants of modular tensor categories, so these generalised modular data are good candidates for more fine-grained invariants.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究仿射李代数𝔰𝔩(2)顶点算子代数的环面1点函数，探索其模性质，构建向量值模形式，并利用模张量范畴理论给出模群作用的显式公式。
AI.motivation: 共形场论通常定义在黎曼球面上，但物理上要求其能在任意黎曼曲面上良好定义。为了深入理解高亏格情况，需要全面掌握环面1点函数，特别是当插入点可以标记为顶点算子代数的任意模而不仅仅是顶点算子代数本身时的情况。
AI.method: 以非负整数水平的简单仿射𝔰𝔩(2)顶点算子代数为具体例子，研究其环面1点函数的模性质。确定这些函数张成的空间维度，选择自然基构建向量值模形式，描述这些形式的同余性质。利用有理顶点算子代数的模范畴是模张量范畴这一事实，用范畴数据给出模群作用的显式公式。
AI.result: 确定了环面1点函数张成的空间维度，构造了向量值模形式，找到了维度不超过3的所有向量值模形式的显式生成元（当插入来自简单模而非顶点算子代数本身时）。给出了模群作用在环面1点函数上的显式公式，这些广义模数据有望成为比传统S和T矩阵更精细的模张量范畴不变量。
AI.conclusion: 环面1点函数具有丰富的模性质，其研究对于理解高亏格共形场论至关重要。通过范畴方法给出的显式公式表明，这些广义模数据可能成为模张量范畴的更精细不变量，超越了传统字符的S和T矩阵的局限性。
